featured.text: The slow and clumsy wetas have been around on the island since the times of the dinosaurs, and have evolved and survived in an environment where they had no enemies until rats came to the island with European immigrants.
It is easy for us to tell our friends from our enemies.
These people usually triumph over their enemies because of their wit and their great energy.
They establish rules to stay away from enemies.
Therefore, they have (24) enemies than other people.

definition.en_def: A person or group that is actively opposed or hostile to someone or something.
definition.example: The hero faced his greatest enemy in the final battle.
